mapper.insert: insert into order_product (order_id, sku_id, product_name, product_number, product_price, sku_attr,code) values (#{orderId}, #{skuId}, #{productName}, #{productNumber}, #{productPrice}, #{code}, #{skuAttr})
mapper.select: select id, order_id, sku_id, product_name, product_number, product_price, sku_attr,code from order_product
